articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnamese Ministry of Public Security led by Minister Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, arrived here today.
					 The delegation was greeted at the airport by DPRK Vice-Minister of People's Security Sin Il Nam and Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Van Cu.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Monday on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A documentary film "Educators in era of Songun bringing up future pillars" was recently produced by the Korean Documentary and Scientific Film Studio.
					The film impressively shows educators successfully bringing up future pillars of Songun Korea, thus making a positive contribution to glorifying the socialist education system under the warm care of  General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also shows those educators devoting themselves to teaching and upbringing with transparent conscience to arm youngsters with the Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and prepare them as intellectuals who would contribute to the development of the nation's science and technology and its prosperity. 
					
					 The film emphasizes that Kim Jong Il's care is the profound care under which a bright future of the motherland of Songun is in safe hands.

articles.title: Juche Character and National Character, Fundamental Principle of Revolution and Construction
articles.content:
Juche Character and National Character, Fundamental Principle of Revolution and Construction
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche with credit, preserving all along the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					On the basis of the elucidation of the independent nature of the socialist cause and the socio-historical conditions of its implementation, the immortal Juche idea has defined the maintenance of the Juche character and national character as the fundamental principle that must be adhered to in the whole course of building socialism.
					
					The essence and importance of the principle are clarified in the famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" published by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on June 19, 1997.
					
					Maintaining the Juche character of the revolution and construction means that the popular masses shape the destiny of their country and nation and their own destiny independently and creatively as the masters and keeping the national character alive means that they preserve and develop the inherent and fine characteristics of the nation and apply them to all fields of social life.
					
					Embodied in the national character are the spirit of national independence and cultural traditions of a nation, which constitutes a precious wealth of the country and nation and an important wherewithal for the socialist construction.
					
					Only by adhering to the Juche character and national character can the socialist cause be the truly revolutionary cause of championing and realizing the independence of the masses and of ensuring the independent development and prosperity of the nation.
					
					It is a historical lesson that one cannot avoid a catastrophic end if one pins hope on the "ready remedy" of the imperialists without bridging over the political and economic difficulties created in the course of social progress with one's own strength in one's own way.
					
					The danger of the  national obliteration policy pursued by the imperialists under the pretext of "integration" of the world glaringly shows how important is the preservation of national character along with the Juche character in the state administration and all other spheres of the revolution and construction.
					
					The DPRK has vigorously forged ahead along the one road of victory and glory under the banner of independence, shattering the unceasing political and economic blockades and all sorts of challenges of the imperialists.
					
					The WPK and the people led by it will in the future, too, discharge their internationalist duty and mission of the times in the struggle for accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche and achieving the independence of the world by invariably holding fast to the principle of Juche and the principle of national independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Steadfast Will for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Steadfast Will for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- It is the revolutionary duty and obligation of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people and the sacred national task entrusted to our generation to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung who had devoted all his mental energies and pains to accomplishment of the cause of national reunification from the first days of building a new country till the last moments of his great life.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It is the unshakable will and determination of the WPK to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country without fail by carrying through the behests of the President, true to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's idea on national reunification and his leadership, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated as the three charters for national reunification the three principles for national reunification, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by the President and has led the Korean nation's reunification movement at every step to serve for carrying out the three charters.
					
					 The important and principled problem in achieving the national reunification at present is to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to the letter.
					
					 It is the principled stand of the WPK constant in the future to achieve the national reunification in an independent and peaceful way by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation in the spirit of the above-said declarations.
					
					 The WPK's will for national reunification is manifested in the fact that it has consistently pursued the all-embracing politics based on patriotism, giving top priority to the national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The all-embracing politics of the WPK is the politics based on the noble human love for everyone and the most widespread patriotic politics that closely rallies all the classes and strata of the nation for the common cause of the country and the nation.
					
					 The WPK will as ever inspiringly encourage all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to turn out as one in the patriotic movement for reunification true to the behests of the President and thus realize the historic cause of national reunification, the supreme desire of the nation, without fail.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsular Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsula Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Citizens' Forum for Peace was formed with due ceremony on Oct. 1 in south Korea. It groups representatives of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Women's Society for Peace and other civic and public organizations in south Korea. 
					 A declaration adopted at the ceremony said that over six decades have passed since the division of the nation, adding that the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas are now waging a vigorous struggle to achieve reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 The declaration noted that due to the rash acts of the Lee Myung Bak's "government" against reunification and the people the past era of dictatorship is coming back as evidenced by the deterioration of the inter-Korean relations and the undisguised violation of democracy and human rights, etc.
					
					 The declaration called upon various organizations to wage a movement for peace against war and boost international support and cooperation for peace and reunification of Korea. 
					
					 It also appealed to the people of all strata to firmly unite and struggle for peace and reunification of the peninsula.

articles.title: Suppression of Youth and Students in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of Youth and Students in S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) on Oct. 2 issued a statement entitled "We denounce the arrest and suppression of the executive chairman of the Youth and Students' Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration".
					 The statement referred to the fact that the executive chairman was detained on charges of "violation of the 'National Security Law'" on Sept. 27.
					
					 Urging the termination of the Lee Myung Bak regime engaging itself in the fascist dictatorship to stamp out the progressive forces, the statement declared that Hanchongryon would turn out in the struggle against the unpopular regime in a do-or-die spirit.
					
					 It demanded that the security authorities stop crackdown upon candle-light actions and immediately set free the executive chairman.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Founding Observed in Italy and Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Founding Observed in Italy and Guinea
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Lectures were sponsored by the Unified Communist Party of Italy and the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea on Sept. 24 and 25 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Osvaldo Pesce, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, in the lecture titled "Feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the party building" said that the WPK has demonstrated only victory and glory under his wise leadership.
					
					 In the work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and many other works Kim Jong Il clarified the position and role of the party of the working class in the revolution and construction and orientation and ways to strengthen and develop the party into the party of the leader, etc., thus leading the WPK to fulfill its mission as the general staff of the revolution, he noted, and continued: 
					
					 The feats Kim Jong Il has performed by strengthening and developing the WPK into an invincible party on the basis of the Juche idea and with his Songun leadership will go down to posterity along the history of the people's struggle to achieve independence and  progress and build a new world.
					
					  Malik Souma, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, in the lecture titled "The fluttering flag of the Workers' Party of Korea" said that the WPK has traversed only the road of victory without making any mistake or undergoing turns and twists while implementing its line despite all sorts of tempests of history. This was possible only thanks to the guidance of the outstanding leaders, he added. 
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious under the flag of the WPK fluttering as a symbol of victory and glory, he stressed.

articles.title: National Coordinating Committee Inaugurated in Ukraine
articles.content:
National Coordinating Committee Inaugurated in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A national coordinating committee of the Ukrainian Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Association for the Study of Songun Policy was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kiev on Sept. 28. 
					 Prof. and Dr. Gennadi Berdishev at Kiev University was elected its honorary chairman, Chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea Nikolai Polishk its chairman and Vice-Chairman of the association P. Malanuk its secretary general. 
					
					 A message of greetings to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the ceremony on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: September Issue of Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Published
articles.content:
September Issue of Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Published
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The September issue of magazine "Paektu-Halla" was published by the General Association of Koreans in China as a special issue under the title "The great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is the father of the nation who performed immortal exploits in the nation-building" on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK. 
					 The magazine conveyed photo-accompanied accounts of the meetings and other events held by the association and organizations under it on the above-said occasion. 
					
					 It carried articles titled "The great brilliant commander of Songun who has demonstrated the dignity and honor of the DPRK to the whole world with his Songun politics", "The immortal tales associated with the national emblem and national flag" and "Events recorded in every decade of the history of the DPRK". 
					
					 Noting that the 60-year-long history of the DPRK is a glorious history in which heydays of prosperity of the nation were brought about in the crucible of the anti-imperialist revolution under the leadership of the legendary great men, the articles said that under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il the DPRK has dynamically advanced only along the road of glory.

articles.title: Implementation of October 4 Declaration Urged
articles.content:
Implementation of October 4 Declaration Urged
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, on October 4 issued a statement titled "Let all Koreans unite as one and usher in new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity" on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement noted that the said declaration adopted at the north-south summit last year is a historic declaration which helped usher in a new era in which Koreans are striving to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity in the history of the nation by rejecting foreign forces by their concerted efforts and expanding and developing the inter-Korean relations on a higher stage.
					
					  The adoption of the said declaration gave further momentum to the desire of all compatriots for independent reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The said declaration, a result of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's strong will for reunification and his wise leadership, is a practical programme for developing the inter-Korean relations and opening up a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of Koreans.
					
					  As soon as the Lee Myung Bak group, sycophantic towards the U.S., came to power, they cried out for confrontation with fellow countrymen. They have laid grave obstacles in the way of achieving reconciliation and unity of the nation and developing the inter-Korean relations and got evermore desperate in their moves for confrontation with the DPRK, totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration recognized, supported and approved by all Koreans and the world people and peddling the anti-reunification watchword "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars".
					
					 The reality calls upon all Koreans to turn out in the nation-wide struggle to decisively smash the anti-reunification moves of the Lee group, adhere to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to the end under the banner of "By our nation itself" and create a new history of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should firmly unite as one to resolutely foil the Lee group's sycophantic and treacherous acts of violating the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and selling off its interests and threatening peace and security, subservient to foreign forces, and dynamically advance the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia competencia universitaria de futbol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia competencia universitaria de futbol
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la competencia universitaria de futbol con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, centro supremo de la educacion y la ciencia de tipo jucheano.
					En la competencia entre los equipos de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang la primera vencio a la segunda por 4:1.
					
					Al verla, el Dirigente senalo que nuestros universitarios revolucionarios y combativos no solo dedican su inteligencia y pasion a la investigacion cientifica para la patria y el pueblo sino tambien libran bien las actividades artisticas y deportivas y les felicito por exito de su partido.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que ambas universidades formaron gran numero de competentes cuadros nacionales y el personal tecnico que juegan un rol nuclear en la revolucion y la construccion contribuyendo asi activamente a la realizacion de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera y evaluo altamente sus exitos logrados en el pasado.
					
					Dijo que formar a nuestros universitarios, quienes se encargaran del futuro de la patria como personas fidedignas dispuestas de elevado nivel de conocimientos y de la robustez fisica, tiene gran importancia en la coronacion de la causa de la revolucion jucheana y la construccion de la patria prospera y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la ensenanza, la educacion y el desarrollo deportivo del centro universitario.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del partido y otros funcionarios.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de familia de Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de familia de Zhang Weihua 
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un cesto de flores que le dedicara el dia 6 la familia del martir chino revolucionario antijapones Zhang Weihua con motivo del 63o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Editado el numero de septiembre de la revista "Paektu-Halla"
articles.content:
Editado el numero de septiembre de la revista "Paektu-Halla"
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- La Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China edito el numero de septiembre de la revista "Paektu-Halla".
					  Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la revista hizo una edicion especial bajo el titulo de "El gran Lider, Generalisimo Kim Il Sung es el padre de la nacion quien realizo imborrables hazanas en la construccion del Estado". 
					
					  Redacto con fotos las noticias sobre actos y otras celebraciones referentes al sexagenario de la RPDC, que tuvieron lugar en la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China y en las organizaciones filiales. 
					
					  Ademas, publico los articulos intitulados "El gran General Insigne del Songun (priorizacion militar) exalta a todo el mundo la dignidad y el honor de la RPDC con la politica de Songun", "Inolvidables episodios sobre la bandera y el escudo nacionales" y "Eventos registrados en cada decada de la historia de la RPDC".
					
					  Estos articulos senalan que la trayectoria de 60 anos de la RPDC es una historia gloriosa en que bajo la direccion de los Grandes Hombres legendarios, se abrio la era de prosperidad nacional en el fragor de la revolucion antiimperialista, y subrayan que gracias al gran Lider y al gran Dirigente, la RPDC vino avanzando a pasos firmes por su unico camino de gloria.

articles.title: Conmemora primer aniversario de Declaracion de 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Conmemora primer aniversario de Declaracion de 4 de Octubre
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del primer aniversario  de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, el vicepresidente de la Asociacion General de Coreanos resistentes en China, Cha Sang Bo, publico el dia 4 una declaracion intitulada "Todos los coreanos, unidos, deben abrir una nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad".
					  La nota subraya que la declaracion en cuestion aprobada el ano pasado en la cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea deviene la historica que permite abrir una nueva epoca de la historia nacional para lograr la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad al rechazar las fuerzas extranjeras y desarrollar a una etapa mas alta las relaciones Norte-Sur  uniendo las fuerzas de los connacionales.
					
					  En virtud de la aprobacion de la declaracion mencionada, la pasion de todos los coreanos por la reunificacion independiente se eleva mas que nunca, senala el documento y continua:
					
					La Declaracion del 4 de Octubre preparada  por la firme voluntad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la reunificacion y su sabia guia sirve del programa de practica  para desarrollar las relaciones Norte-Sur y abrir una nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					  Pero, tan pronto como tomo el poder, la banda de Lee Myung Bak, traidor servil a EE.UU., nego totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que reconocen  y aplauden todos los coreanos y todo el mundo y propuso la "desnuclearizacion, apertura, 3 mil dolares" en contra de la reunificacion inculcando la confrontacion intercoreana. Ademas, crea la dificultad grave en la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur y recurre freneticamente a las maniobras de confrontacion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  La realidad demanda a todos los coreanos que se levanten en la lucha pannacional por frustrar rotundamente las maniobras anti-reunificacion de la horda de Lee, mantener hasta el fin las declaraciones referidas bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y por crear la nueva historia de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, unidos como un solo hombre, deben frustrar por completo las maquinaciones criminales entreguistas de la banda de Lee que viola la dignidad y la soberania nacionales y amenaza la paz y la seguridad en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas y  adelantar con vigor la epoca de la reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
